concept.description: Contributes the :Api and :Public labels to API types
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type) WHERE NOT (type.fqn =~ ".*\\.impl\\..*") AND NOT (type.fqn =~ ".*\\.spi\\..*") SET type:Api, type:Public RETURN type

concept.description: Contributes the :Spi and :Public labels to SPI types
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type) WHERE type.fqn =~ ".*\\.spi\\..*" SET type:Spi, type:Public RETURN type

concept.description: Contributes the :Impl label to implementation types
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type) WHERE type.fqn =~ ".*\\.impl\\..*" SET type:Impl RETURN type

constraint.description: API/SPI types must not extend/implement internal types.
API/SPI methods must not expose internal types.
constraint.cypher:
// return values MATCH (type:Type:Public)-[:DECLARES]->(method)-[:RETURNS]->(returntype:Type:Impl) WHERE (method.visibility="public" OR method.visibility="protected") RETURN method
// parameters UNION ALL MATCH (type:Type:Public)-[:DECLARES]->(method)-[:HAS]->(parameter)-[:OF_TYPE]->(parametertype:Type:Impl) WHERE (method.visibility="public" OR method.visibility="protected") RETURN method

constraint.description: API/SPI fields must not expose internal types.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:Public)-[:DECLARES]->(field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldtype:Type:Impl) WHERE (field.visibility="public" OR field.visibility="protected") RETURN field
